dialog.text: So, do you have any other band competitions coming up that you want to participate in?

Well, there's one we want to enter but it's about a four hour drive which will mean the band will have to stay at least overnight. I'ts busy season at the farm, but I still have to talk to my brothers about it to make sure they'll be ok with me taking the time off.

dialog.text: Do you think you'll win if you enter any?

I'm hopeful! I think we're great, but I hear the competition is expected to be stiff. In the music industry, that's the breaks. You have to develop a tough skin. This coming Summer we'll be at the Band Battle in Louisiana near you! I can't wait to try the food there.

dialog.text: That's good to hear. I bet an upcoming inspection would have everyone nervous. Anything you're worried about?
